data.title: Bangor Daily News
data.meta_description: Bangor Daily News - a place for remembering loved ones; a space for sharing memories, life stories, milestones, to express condolences, and celebrate life of your loved ones
data.text:
Evelyn Baird

Evelyn Ruth Baird, born on October 28, 1933, in Camden, Maine, passed away peacefully on August 4, 2024, with her beloved husband holding her hand. She was 90 years old.

Evelyn was the cherished daughter of Herbert and Mary Lunt. She married her high school sweetheart, Wilbur Edgar Baird Sr., with whom she shared a...

Steven Burgoyne

Steve Burgoyne passed away unexpectedly at home on August 6, 2023. He was 67. After a year of profound loss, it is time for a memorial gathering to celebrate his life. It will be held at Homestead Lane in Carmel, Maine, on Saturday, August 31, 2024, beginning at 3 p.m. Family and friends, please come and share your...

Donna Dray

Donna Marie Dray, 55, of Northfield and Bangor, passed away on July 29, 2024, at NL Hospital in Bangor, with her children at her side, after a month-long battle for treatment of acute complications related to cancer.

Born on August 27, 1968, in Calais, ME, to mother, Karen M. (Kneeland) Polley and stepfather, John...

James Orcutt

James L. Orcutt, age 77, of Greenbush, passed peacefully at home on May 14, 2024, his wife and daughter, and nurse by his side.

He was skilled in many trades, including construction, avionics, and radar maintenance for the FAA in Roswell, NM. James, a USN Veteran, proudly served and retired from the Navy after 26...

Rina (Cote) Martin

Rina C. (Cote) Martin, 93, of Grand Isle, Maine, peacefully passed away on August 15, 2024, surrounded by her loving family. Rina was a beacon of selflessness, compassion, and unwavering faith, and her absence will be deeply felt by all who knew her.

Born on August 23, 1930, Rina was a devoted wife, mother, and...

Victoria (Crabbe) Morrison

Victoria S. (Crabbe) Morrison, known affectionately as Vickie, passed away peacefully on August 14, 2024, in Bangor, Maine, at the age of 84. Born on January 4, 1940, in Argyle, Canada, Vickie dedicated 35 years of her life as a beloved Ed-Tech at Mapleton Elementary School, where she touched the lives of many...

Carlene Andersen

Carlene Andersen passed on July 26, 2024, at the age of 73. She was laid to rest at Evergreen Cemetery in Hermon, Maine, on August 11, 2024, alongside her husband, Carl Andersen. She spent her life raising her children and working in the field of special education.

Carlene is survived by her daughter, Dianne Bowen;...

Nicholas Laplante

Happy Heavenly Birthday Mommy's Peanut.

If I could have one wish,

it would be to hold you in my arms again,

to rest your head close to my heart,

to hug and kiss you, and never let you go.

Not a day goes by that I don't think of you,

and try my best to live for you.

We love you more than words.

Vern Lemieux

You, my love, a poor farm boy from northern Maine, enlisted in the Army at the age of 17 to serve your country and to see the world. Wounded, a year later in Korea, you went on to serve 30 years in the Infantry, earning both high school and college degrees, and retiring as a 1st Sergeant in command of 250 soldiers....

Justin Dunton

"Max stepped into his private boat and waved good-bye and sailed back over a year and in and out of weeks and through a day and into the night of his very own room where he found his supper waiting for him - and it was still hot."- Where the Wild Things Are

18 years ago today you left and began a new journey. You...

Ruth Kinney

Those we love don't go away, they walk beside us every day; unseen, unheard, but always near. Still loved, still missed and very dear.

Missing you,

Joe, Tony, Sarah, Arion, Sofia, Marlene, Frank and Mack

John Condon

A committal service for John "Jack" B. Condon, 87, who passed away on August 7, 2024, will be held at Marston Cemetery in Orrington, at 1 p.m. Tuesday, August 20, 2024. A celebration of life will follow at EOCC. For a complete obituary please visit BrookingsSmith.com.

Cindy Folsom

Cindy L. Folsom, 71, went home to her Lord on January 7, 2024, in Houlton, following a second battle with cancer. She was born October 13, 1952, in Houlton, the daughter of Gloria (Little) and Weldon Folsom.

A graveside service will be held 1 p.m. Saturday, August 17, 2024, at Hodgdon Cemetery, Walker Road, Hodgdon....

Shelva Goodridge

Shelva Jean Goodridge, of Spring Hill, FL, and Newport, ME, passed away on May 18, 2024. Funeral services will be held at 1 p.m. on August 10, 2024, at High Street Congregational Church in Newport, followed by a committal at Fairview Cemetery in Canaan. Refreshments to follow at Canaan Town Hall.

Delores Stevens

A graveside committal service for Delores M. "Dolly" Stevens, who passed away on January 17, 2024, will be held 2 p.m. Saturday, August 17, 2024, in the family lot at Pine Grove Cemetery, Dover-Foxcroft. A full obituary may be viewed at laryfuneralhome.com.

Gloria Allen

Gloria A. Allen of Ozark, Alabama, and Brewer, Maine, passed away on October 7, 2023, surrounded by her two loving daughters. A memorial service will be held at the Maine Veterans' Memorial Cemetery, where she will be interred and will join her husband, David J. Allen, who passed away on March 17, 2018. This will be...

Ethel Harriman

There will be a graveside service of remembrance for Ethel Harriman, who died May 6, 2024, at 11 a.m. on Saturday, August 10, 2024, at Lawndale Cemetery on Stillwater Avenue in Old Town.

Roger Marquis

Our hearts were saddened by the loss of a husband, father, brother, grandfather, and great-grandfather. We would like to thank everyone for their words of kindness, thoughtfulness of the cards, the food that was given, and the love and support that was given to my mom and siblings during a time of remembering all...

Thomas Rush III

The Family of Thomas Rush III wishes to express heartfelt appreciation to all those who have reached out to our Family during this sad time. The many acts of kindness, have been overwhelming, and truly helped to ease our pain. Special thanks to our Eden Baptist Church Family, Beacon Hospice, and Jordan-Fernald...

Ray Leonard

There are no words to express our heartfelt sympathy and support you have extended towards our family during this difficult time of loss of my husband, our children's dad, and grandchildren's grampy. Your kind expressions have touched our hearts and offered us much peace.

Prayerfully Always,

Andria, Jeff and Cathy

Ralph Bickford

The family of

Ralph A. Bickford

(1/16/1934 - 2/15/2024)

Extends their gratitude to the medical workers and personnel at Houlton Regional Hospital, Northern Light EMMC, and Northern Light Hospice for their kindness and diligence in caring for our dear husband and father during his time with them.

Bette H. Bickford...

Harold Williams Sr.

During our time of sorrow, expressions of sympathy were conveyed to us in many ways. We appreciate your thoughtfulness and thank you most sincerely.

The Family of Harold D. Williams Sr.

William "Bill" Ranta

Would like to express their heartfelt and sincere thank you for all the support, kind words and help during the past months since Billy's passing. Thank You for supporting the Monson American Legion Post 116 in Bill's honor, the wonderful food, flowers, visits and prayers. All those who came to Billy's service we...

Honey Bartlett

To the family and many friends of the late Honey Bartlett, we wish to extend our sincere thanks for the condolences and support that we have received. And express our gratitude for all donations made in her name.

The Bartlett Family
